languages.text: "Предел... рассвета... Я зрю тебя..." {n}Уралону хватает сил на слабую, исполненную мстительной радости улыбку.{/n} "Вступи в тленные просторы реальности и владей ею. Я отдал все, что имел, во имя твое. Слава... Истине..." {n}Нечестивый гигант обмякает, жуткий триумфальный оскал застывает на его лице навеки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Предел... рассвета... Я зрю тебя..." {n}Уралону хватает сил на слабую, исполненную мстительной радости улыбку.{/n} "Вступи в тленные просторы реальности и владей ею. Я отдал все, что имел, во имя твое. Слава... Истине..." {n}Нечестивый гигант обмякает, жуткий триумфальный оскал застывает на его лице навеки.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Edge... of Daybreak... I witness you..." {n}Uralon musters enough strength for a faint vengeful smile.{/n} "Enter the forlorn halls of reality and claim them. I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}

I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: “边缘……锋刃……我见证了你……”{n}乌拉隆凝聚起了最后的力量，露出了复仇的笑容。{/n}“进入那荒凉的现实殿堂，夺回它们。我以你的圣名献出了一切……向真理……致意……”{n}他巨大的身躯瘫软下来，充满胜利意味的邪恶表情凝在了他的脸上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Edge... of Daybreak... I witness you..." {n}Uralon musters enough strength for a faint vengeful smile.{/n} "Enter the forlorn halls of reality and claim them. I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “边缘……锋刃……我见证了你……”{n}乌拉隆凝聚起了最后的力量，露出了复仇的笑容。{/n}“进入那荒凉的现实殿堂，夺回它们。我以你的圣名献出了一切……向真理……致意……”{n}他巨大的身躯瘫软下来，充满胜利意味的邪恶表情凝在了他的脸上。{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: « Lame... de l'Aube... Je vous vois... » {n}Uralon puise dans ses dernières forces pour esquisser un sourire vengeur.{/n} « Pénétrez dans les chambres délaissées de la réalité et prenez-en le contrôle. J'ai tout donné en votre nom. Gloire... à la vérité... » {n}Son corps imposant se relâche entièrement, son visage affichant à tout jamais un air malfaisant de triomphe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Edge... of Daybreak... I witness you..." {n}Uralon musters enough strength for a faint vengeful smile.{/n} "Enter the forlorn halls of reality and claim them. I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Lame... de l'Aube... Je vous vois... » {n}Uralon puise dans ses dernières forces pour esquisser un sourire vengeur.{/n} « Pénétrez dans les chambres délaissées de la réalité et prenez-en le contrôle. J'ai tout donné en votre nom. Gloire... à la vérité... » {n}Son corps imposant se relâche entièrement, son visage affichant à tout jamais un air malfaisant de triomphe.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: 「暁の…刃…見たぞ…」{n}ウラロンはかすかな復讐の笑みを浮かべるだけの力を振り絞った。{/n}「現実の寂莫とした回廊に入り求めよ。あなたの名において、俺はすべてを捧げた。真実よ…万歳…」{n}彼の巨体はぐったりとし、勝利の邪悪な表情を浮かべたまま倒れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Edge... of Daybreak... I witness you..." {n}Uralon musters enough strength for a faint vengeful smile.{/n} "Enter the forlorn halls of reality and claim them. I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「暁の…刃…見たぞ…」{n}ウラロンはかすかな復讐の笑みを浮かべるだけの力を振り絞った。{/n}「現実の寂莫とした回廊に入り求めよ。あなたの名において、俺はすべてを捧げた。真実よ…万歳…」{n}彼の巨体はぐったりとし、勝利の邪悪な表情を浮かべたまま倒れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: «Filo... del Amanecer... soy testigo...». {n}Uralon logra esbozar una sonrisa vengativa.{/n} «Entra en las salas abandonadas de la realidad y hazte con ellas. Alabada sea... la Verdad...». {n}El coloso queda inerte, con una expresión triunfal y malvada eternamente grabada en su rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Edge... of Daybreak... I witness you..." {n}Uralon musters enough strength for a faint vengeful smile.{/n} "Enter the forlorn halls of reality and claim them. I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Filo... del Amanecer... soy testigo...». {n}Uralon logra esbozar una sonrisa vengativa.{/n} «Entra en las salas abandonadas de la realidad y hazte con ellas. Alabada sea... la Verdad...». {n}El coloso queda inerte, con una expresión triunfal y malvada eternamente grabada en su rostro.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Rand ... des Tagesanbruchs ... Ich sehe Euch ..." {n}Uralon bringt noch genug Kraft für ein schwaches, rachsüchtiges Lächeln auf.{/n} "Betretet die einsamen Hallen der Realität und erobert sie. Ich habe in Eurem Namen alles gegeben, was ich hatte. Begrüßt ... die Wahrheit ..." {n}Sein riesiger Körper erschlafft. Sein Gesicht wird für immer eine bösartige Miene des Triumphs tragen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Edge... of Daybreak... I witness you..." {n}Uralon musters enough strength for a faint vengeful smile.{/n} "Enter the forlorn halls of reality and claim them. I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}

Ich habe in Eurem Namen alles gegeben, was ich hatte. Begrüßt ... die Wahrheit ..." {n}Sein riesiger Körper erschlafft. Sein Gesicht wird für immer eine bösartige Miene des Triumphs tragen.{/n}
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Tan... Vakti... Sana tanıklık ediyorum..." {n}Uralon, çelimsiz ancak kindar bir şekilde sırıtacak kadar gücünü topluyor.{/n} "Gerçekliğin ıssız salonlarına gir ve hepsini ele geçir. Sahip olduğum her şeyi senin adına verdim. Hakikat'i... Selamlayın..." {n}Koca bedeni gevşiyor, yüzü ise habis bir zafer ifadesiyle donakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Edge... of Daybreak... I witness you..." {n}Uralon musters enough strength for a faint vengeful smile.{/n} "Enter the forlorn halls of reality and claim them. I gave all that I had in your name. Hail... the Truth..." {n}His giant body goes limp, his face forever retaining a wicked expression of triumph.{/n}
